How in the hell does Carnival, a cruise ship company that pays virtually no federal income taxes, receive a bailout, but the Postal Service, the most popular government agency in America, does not?

The Post Office is essential. Cruise ships are not. https://www.wsj.com/articles/how-fed-intervention-saved-carnival-11587920400?mod=hp_lead_pos4

More than 21,000 Utah employers leveraged @SBAgov’s #PaycheckProtectionProgram to help keep Utahns employed before the funding ran out. This vital #COVID19 relief program restarts today and I encourage small businesses across Utah to apply for these forgivable loans. https://twitter.com/SBAgov/status/1254779835785904128 QT @SBAgov TODAY: SBA will resume accepting #PaycheckProtectionProgram applications from participating lenders. Learn how to apply and find a lender near you.

▶️ /funding-programs/loans/paycheck-protection-program

An update on this: the IRS has extended the deadline to May 5 for SSI and VA beneficiaries to apply to receive $500 dependent payments.

This is great news, but the IRS must offer an extension for others who don’t file taxes and need to claim a child, including SS beneficiaries. https://twitter.com/SenKamalaHarris/status/1252752985127620615 QT @SenKamalaHarris DEADLINE ALERT: Social security, railroad retirement, or VA beneficiaries—TOMORROW by 9:00AM PST is the deadline to file with the IRS to receive a $500 dependent payment.

Californians, please contact my office for assistance if you encounter any issues. https://twitter.com/IRSnews/status/1252333747510431744

RT @GinaOrtizJones Nurses, grocery store employees, bus drivers, janitorial staff and more have worked tirelessly to keep us safe and healthy during this pandemic. 

We must #StandWithEssentialWorkers and ensure they have the protection, health care, and financial support they need and deserve.

Doctors are getting fired as America faces the highest number of coronavirus deaths on Earth.

Who can still defend a health care "system" dominated by profit and greed?

It is time to do what the majority of our people want and establish a rational, Medicare-for-All program. https://twitter.com/sarahkliff/status/1254373297208397826 QT @sarahkliff A for-profit company purchased three hospitals in a rural part of West Virginia and Ohio.

It fired doctors. Medical supplies ran short. Vendors went unpaid. The hospitals closed, and the region now has to fight coronavirus with 530 fewer beds.

My latest: https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/26/us/hospital-closures-west-virginia-ohio.html

RT @rocunited We #StandWithEssentialWorkers & ask that you do the same by supporting @ewarren’s proposal for an Essential Workers Bill of Rights.

It’s vital we protect all frontline workers — including restaurant workers — in this crisis. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWnaCBrVcAIHimI.jpg

#PPP Update 2:
Just 20 minutes after relaunch we started receiving two complaints from lenders:

1. Problems with E-Tran

2. Concern bulk application submission from big lenders would take all the money

Here is an update on both http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1254830713427439618/pu/img/o8KUiT6RqK7hdqHL.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1254830713427439618/pu/vid/320x322/Z2WNFndTjj6eyzlX.mp4?tag=10

It is completely wrong for the BOE to cancel New York’s Presidential Primary.

This decision is not informed by public health: the state is still holding elections for every other seat that day, & so far the only way your ballot will 100% be counted in NY is to vote in person! https://twitter.com/lwvnys/status/1254804375022768128 QT @LWVNYS The State Board of Elections Democratic Commissioners have voted to cancel the Presidential Primary Election in New York.

Voters registered in a party will still have the opportunity to vote for Congressional and State representatives in the June primary. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWn0ARvWsAIsyAR.png

$41 billion. That's how much Jeff Bezos has seen his wealth go up in the past 5 weeks. Meanwhile, his Amazon employees are putting their lives at risk in warehouses across the country. This is what a rigged economy is about, and why we need a political revolution. https://twitter.com/SamAdlerBell/status/1254475472559357953 QT @SamAdlerBell More than 50 amazon workers at MSP1 in Shakopee, MN walked off the job just after 12am this morning to protest the elimination of unpaid time off, unsafe conditions, & the appearance of retaliation against workers who speak out. 

Here's Hafsa Hasan, one of the leaders: http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1254475215939211265/pu/img/mT3Ze2rECaXb5ghS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1254475215939211265/pu/vid/320x564/4A2ogCkM-Z_dTDzN.mp4?tag=10

If you’re an essential worker, Congress needs to hear from you. Tell us what you’re seeing on the front lines—post about your story or share your story through the link below. 

And if you know someone who is an essential worker, share this post with them.
https://act.elizabethwarren.com/page/s/essential-workers-story-share?source=soc-PET-ew-tw-ShareStory

Between reports of supplies being seized by the government, price gouging, & political favoritism, there’s a lot of confusion & dismay about getting supplies to states in need. Project Air Bridge's wholesalers should explain how their supplies are priced & distributed.

Project Air Bridge is Jared Kushner’s secretive public-private partnership for COVID-19 supplies – but it’s failing. States can’t get equipment & nobody's explaining how the project works. @SenBlumenthal & I want answers from the participating suppliers. https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/transparency-warren-data-white-house-medical-supply-program/story?id=70363896

Saddened to hear of Guillermo "Memo” Garcia’s passing. Mr. Garcia was a victim of an act of sheer evil, who bravely fought for his life for months. Heidi and I send our prayers and heartfelt condolences to the Garcia family.
https://kvia.com/news/el-paso/2020/04/26/last-remaining-hospital-patient-from-aug-3-el-paso-mass-shooting-has-died/

RT @candacefor24 Join me with @ewarren and @RoKhanna in elevating the voices of essential workers, and asking Congress to include their Essential Workers Bill of Rights in the next COVID-10 relief package.

1. Call your reps.
2. Share your story 
3. Tell us why you #StandWithEssentialWorkers http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWnqHlIUMAEggFC.jpg
Our campaign statement on the New York State Board of Elections decision to cancel the state’s presidential primary: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWobOGoXYAMt74_.png

Thinking about these words today on what would have been the great Coretta Scott King's 93rd birthday: “Freedom is never really won. You earn it and win it in every generation.” May her fight for justice and equality live on in all of us. #CelebratingCoretta

It’s time to demand an Essential Workers Bill of Rights. Take a few minutes to call your representative and stand with our frontline workers. https://twitter.com/TeamWarren/status/1254829478896959493 QT @TeamWarren Wondering what you can do to #StandWithEssentialWorkers? We’ve got you. 

Call now using the following link—we’ll connect you with your representatives and let you know what to say to demand an Essential Workers Bill of Rights: http://ewar.ren/CallReps http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWoKFpYXkAMqPgo.jpg

The best way to thank our essential workers is to guarantee them:

✅ living wages
✅ paid sick leave
✅ hazard pay
✅ labor protections
✅ healthcare, childcare, & more

Join @ewarren and I on IG Live in 10 mins to rally for an Essential Workers Bill of Rights! 💪🏽 https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1254760694857322504 QT @ewarren I’ll be joining @AOC live on Instagram at 2:30pm ET to talk more about how Congress needs to pass an Essential Workers Bill of Rights and how we must all #StandWithEssentialWorkers—today and every day.

In 2019, 700,000+ New Jerseyans relied on SNAP. As the #COVID19 crisis continues causing record unemployment, more families in NJ & around the US will need this vital program. That’s why I’m asking Congress for more SNAP funding in the next relief package. https://www.insidernj.com/press-release/booker-colleagues-urge-congressional-leadership-increased-funding-protect-facing-food-insecurity/

Workers like Kenya Slaughter didn’t plan to risk their lives on the frontlines of a pandemic. They need an Essential Workers Bill of Rights for the safety equipment, premium pay, paid sick leave, & job protections they deserve. #StandWithEssentialWorkers https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/26/opinion/covid-workers-dollar-general.html

Again: NY is still holding primary elections on June 23rd. This decision does not change the fact that people will still be going outside to vote.

If NY doesn’t want to risk possibly millions of ppl voting in-person, we need to mail everyone a ballot. Not an application for one.

ICYMI: I joined @JulieFineNBC5 last week to discuss safely re-opening the economy and helping Texans return to work. WATCH ⤵️ http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1254834229466271744/img/l-QJ7WSYhwMw4rHj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1254834229466271744/vid/480x270/w1c2_24JqxMeAG_i.mp4?tag=13

Look at how these numbers are continuing to rise. Senate Republicans were ready to pass the latest relief package without any resources to expand testing, but my Democratic colleagues and I successfully fought to secure funding for this in the final bill.

More testing is key. https://twitter.com/CAPAction/status/1253683212456468487 QT @CAPAction The United States has 4% of the world’s population and 32% of the world’s confirmed coronavirus cases.

Trump’s chaos has a terrible price. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EWX6I48WAAAXich.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1253682559319408640/vid/320x320/nCvAno6iDwtNJ82O.mp4?tag=13

SBA informs us of following on #PPP relaunch:
1. Lowered minimum number of loans for bulk filings from originally 15K to 5K to allow more banks to submit
2  Bulk files are NOT being processed all at once. The had a pacing mechanism for approvals in place before launch

As I have said: unity isn’t a feeling, it’s a process.

Undemocratic, unilateral decisions that disenfranchise millions of progressive voters &volunteers is extremely destructive to the process of unifying the party for Nov.
